meta.description: ClassQuiz is a quiz app like Kahoot! for students, which is open source and free to use
meta.title: Home

features_description.1: ClassQuiz is a quiz-platform that allows you to create and manage quizzes.
features_description.2: The main feature is a Kahoot!-import function that allows you to import quizzes from Kahoot!-quizzes.
features_description.3: The editor and function of exporting quiz results as Excel files are particular highlights of the software.

index_page.stats: There are already {{user_count}} users and {{quiz_count}} quizzes on ClassQuiz.
index_page.see_what_true_and_false: See what was right or wrong
index_page.see_how_many_true_and_false: See how many were right or wrong
index_page.create_a_quiz_from_scratch: Create a quiz from scratch with the editor and include pictures and more
index_page.find_or_explore: Find (or explore) quizzes made or imported by other people
index_page.import_quiz_from_kahoot_and_edit: Import a quiz from Kahoot! and edit it in ClassQuiz
index_page.check_if_chosen_wisely: Check, if you have chosen wisely
index_page.get_ranking_and_winners: Get the ranking and see who won
index_page.no_tracking_content: Kahoot! tracks you and sends that info to third-parties, but ClassQuiz doesn't.
index_page.self_hostable_content: ClassQuiz can easily be self-hosted, so the data is only in your control!
index_page.user_friendly_content: ClassQuiz aims to be simple, so it is can be used by everyone.
index_page.completely_free_content: ClassQuiz is completely cost free (for the user), without any paid plans or annoying redirects to the upgrade-page. Donations are highly appreciated.
index_page.quiz_results_downloadable_content: Quiz-results can be easily exported into an Excel-spreadsheet. (Didn't know others couldn't do that)
index_page.multilingual_content: ClassQuiz is available in English, French, German, Italian, Norwegian Bokmål, Turkish, and partly Indonesian and Catalan.
index_page.dark_mode_content: One of the most important features a website can have!
index_page.german_server_content: ClassQuiz's servers are located in Germany and hosted by netcup.
index_page.download_quizzes_content: Quizzes can be downloaded as one file and imported at any time. This also lets you move your quizzes to other ClassQuiz instances.
index_page.community_driven_content: ClassQuiz depends on its community for funding, testing ideas, feature requests, translations and more! You can also be a part of the ClassQuiz-community!

overview_page.no_quizzes: Click the "Create"-button, or import a quiz from Kahoot! to get going.

login_page.login_or_create_account: Log in or create an account

success.success_check_mail: Logged in. Check your e-mail inbox.

description.success_check_mail: Please check your e-mail inbox for an e-mail with a link you can click to log in.

description.wrong_creds: Please ensure your password and e-mail address are correct.
description.unexpected: There was the good old unexpected error!

import_page.url_should_look_like_this: The URL should look like this: https://create.kahoot.it/details/...
import_page.side_import_kahoot: On this side you can import quizzes, which live on Kahoot!.
import_page.this_side_classquiz: On this side you can import quizzes, which were exported from ClassQuiz.

admin_page.already_registered_as_admin: There is already an admin registered for this game.
admin_page.start_by_showing_first_question: Start by showing the first question.

play_page.end_sentence: That's it! This was the quiz.

editor_page.right_click_to_delete: Right-click on an answer to delete it!

footer.self_ads: Made with ❤️ by {{mawoka_link}} and with the help of {{others_link}}.
footer.donate: If you find this useful, please consider {{donate_link}}.

error_page.404_text: The page you were looking for is gone or never even existed. Who knows?
error_page.unknown_error_text: That shouldn't happen. It's probably my fault, not yours, but maybe you have a magical power to break stuff...
